summary: Causes the player to gain a small amount of Alchemy Experience when collecting Nirnroot in the wild.
descriptionHtml:
This mod causes the player to gain a small amount of Alchemy experience when collecting Nirnroot in the wild. The amount gained from a single Nirnroot is just short of enough to level alchemy from 15 to 16.

This mod does not contain an esp.
This mod should be installed into the scripts folder within the data folder.
If you are manually installing, you may need to create the scripts folder yourself. This should be okay to install with a manager.

This mod changes the NirnrootACTIVATORScript.pex file, and will be incompatible with any other mod that changes said file. It should be compatible with any mod that does not, however.
author: Kitsunehero
